gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 131, Pistons 123
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Pistons, 131-123. Bennedict Mathurin led the way for the Pacers with a season-high 30 points, along with seven rebounds and eight assists, while Tyrese Haliburton added 14 points and 16 assists in the victory, his fourth consecutive game with 10+ assists. Cade Cunningham tallied 23 points, six rebounds and seven assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Pacers win their fourth straight game as they improve to 13-8 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-21.
